channel.title: sequencing analysis on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in sequencing analysis on Hello World

item.title: SOP of bacteria sequencing analysis
item.description: Quality control QC tools (FastQC, MultiQC …) Is coverage enough ? Is length read length enough ? Is there contamination ? Assembly Assembler tools (Canu, Unicycler, Flye, Ra …) Genome Polishing (Racon, medaka, nanopolish …) Plasmid check(BLAST) Genome annotation NCBI annotation COG analysis for protein functions 16S rRNA/whole genome phylogenetic trees Antibiotic-resistant gene prediction
